articles.content:
DPRK ambassador to Egypt appointed 
    Pyongyang, November 19 (KCNA) -- Jang Myong Son was appointed as Ambassador E. P. of the DPRK to the Arab Republic of Egypt, according to a decree of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
